DOC.brief_summary: In single-site , randomize , control double-blind clinical trial , investigator evaluate effect sodium bicarbonate prevention acute kidney injury high risk patient undergo pump coronary bypass surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Sodium Bicarbonate Prevention Acute Kidney Injury High Risk Patients Undergoing Off-pump Coronary Artery Bypass ( OPCAB )
DOC.criteria: Patients older 20 year schedule elective coronary artery bypass grafting . preoperative estimate glomerular filtration rate ( eGFR ) : 30 ~ 89 % LVEF < 35 % NYHA class III IV age > 70 DM reoperation acute renal impairment patient receive dialysis patient receive steroid ( > 10mg/day prednisolon equivalent ) hemoalkalosis hypernatremia pulmonary edema Hemoglobin < 10 mg/dL
